attributes.action: Scrap trident but put the money into the rest of the armed forces.
attributes.additional_details: Military personnel should also be paid more for what they do. The NHS should always care for them and make sure they are doing well. All ex military personnel should be housed and cared for. GET THEM OFF THE STREETS! With the money I know this is possible. I just need your help. Thank you for your time. Have an awesome day.
attributes.background: I think nuclear weapons are out dated and will never be used. I think trident should be scrapped in the UK and all the money that goes to trident should be invested into the rest of the military. More jobs better weapons and equipment. Therefore making it a safer job.
